translation.en: The Chrissy!
All aboard!
It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.es: Es hora de subir a El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: Tonight's special guests include Upton and the Get Down Bunch,
translation.es: Hoy tenemos a Upton y Los bailarines,

translation.en: Minnie Vanessa and the Hoods.
And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion, everybody's favorite friend of funk--
translation.es: Y ahora, la locomotora de la locomoción, el favorito de todos,

translation.en: D- d- d- d- DJ Train Trax!
Wicka- wicka whoo- whoo!
Hey, rollers and shakers, rockers and breakers!
translation.es: Hola a los que ruedan, se sacuden o frenan.

translation.en: Hey, Loose Caboose, how you feelin' tonight?
I think I'm dyin'.
- - Oh, that sounds serious.
Yeah. I'm dying to see tonight's star performer!
translation.es: Sí. Muerto de ganas de ver a la estrella de hoy.

translation.en: Well, let's get right to it, then. Wicka- wicka woo- woo!
translation.es: ¡Entonces vamos a verlo! ¡Chucu chucu chu chu!

translation.en: Wicka- wicka woo- woo!  You ready to get down?
Oh, yeah!
Come on, Chrissy.  Let's get down.
Try this one. Uh- huh! Oh, yeah!
- Uh- huh! Oh, yeah! -
Now, let's do the Truck Truck Caboose.
- Ready? - Ready!
Oh, I love the Truck Truck Caboose!
OK! OK! Here comes a new one I made up.
translation.es: Y ahora el nuevo que inventé.

translation.en: Now you try, Chrissy!
Oh, yeah! Uh- huh! - Oh, yeah! Uh- huh! - Uh- huh! Oh, yeah!
Look at you two.
- Oh, look at those tires move! -
Oh, that's great!
Yeah, you've got it!
What's that one called?
I don't know yet.
You two make a really great dance duo.
translation.es: Son un gran dúo de baile.

translation.en: Dance with Cory!
So, do you think we'll win?
Are you kidding? With those moves? You two are going to be great at the talent show!
translation.es: ¿Bromeas? ¿Con esos movimientos? Se lucirán en el concurso.

translation.en: Maybe I'll dust off the ol' keytar and play something from my rock opera.
translation.es: Tal vez saque mi sintetizador y toque mi ópera rock.

translation.en: You two are going to be great at the talent show! Hey! What about me?
translation.es: - Se lucirán en el concurso. - ¿Y yo?

translation.en: I-- I'm just trying to save you from your crippling stage fright.
translation.es: Solo intento salvarte de tu pánico escénico.

translation.en: Ooh, right. I forgot about that. Ready for the show, you two?
translation.es: - Lo había olvidado. - ¿Listos para el show?

translation.en: Yeah!
Now, what do we have to remember before any performance?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay que recordar antes de una actuación?

translation.en: Go to the bathroom.
And?
If you play with fire, you're gonna get burned.
translation.es: Si juegas con fuego, te quemarás.

translation.en: Not sure how that works for the talent show, but yes. And?
translation.es: No sé si sirve en este caso, pero sí. Y...

translation.en: Just have fun!
That's right!
Whoa!
Whoa is right! Looks like the whole town showed up.
translation.es: Sí, vaya. Parece que vino todo el pueblo.

translation.en: Come on, Chrissy. Let's go! Oh, yay!
Ooh, they've got corn dogs over there!
What? No way. I don't want to hear your exhaust running all night.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No. No quiero oír tu tubo de escape toda la noche.

translation.en: Welcome to the Bumperton Hills 18th Annual Talent Show!
translation.es: ¡Bienvenidos a la 18 edición del Concurso de talentos de Autovilla!

translation.en: Oh, it's starting.
Please give it up for your humble host and 17- time winner,
translation.es: Por favor, un aplauso para su anfitriona, y 17 veces ganadora,

translation.en: Dr. Ethyl Wiperglass!
That's me!
- - Yeah! Woohoo!
- Go, Dr. Wiperglass! -
Let's hear it for our first contestant, Mrs. O'Tool.
translation.es: Un aplauso para nuestra primera concursante, la Sra. O'Bras.

translation.en: Excuse me, Carsons.
Whoo! You got this, babe! Whoo- ooh!
Magnificent.
What has four wheels and flies?
translation.es: ¿Qué limpia tu cocina y para en cada esquina?

translation.en: - Me! -
- Get it? - Me! A garbage truck.
Wow! Everyone is really good. Wow!
Ugh, finally. After 28 years of cleaning up messes,
translation.es: Finalmente, después de 28 años de limpiar desastres,

translation.en: a chance to sing.
Oh, there you are. Fenderson's called for you.
There's an oil spill on aisle five.
translation.es: Hay un derrame de aceite en el pasillo cinco.

translation.en: That means you're next, Carsons.
You ready?
I'm ready. Chrissy?
Ready!
Great!
OK, we've got this.
Up next, Cory and Chrissy Carson!
translation.es: A continuación, Cory y Chrissy Bólidos.

translation.en: We got this!
OK, wish us luck! Good luck!
I can't watch.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah.
A- ha!  Oh, yeah.
You're doing great! Whoo- hoo!
OK, Chrissy, let's do the secret move I showed you.
translation.es: Bien, Chrissy, hagamos el paso secreto que te mostré.

translation.en: Yeah, go, Chrissy!
Huh? Chrissy?
Ta- da!
- - Yes!
OK, Chrissy. Let's go.
The crowd loved it! You two were great!
translation.es: - Al público le encantó. - Estuvo genial.

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah! Good job, Chrissy.
Dance!
I think you're gonna have to show me how to do that move.
translation.es: Vas a tener que enseñarme ese paso.

translation.en: Let's thank all the contestants for their hard work today.
translation.es: Agradezcamos a todos los concursantes por su esfuerzo.

translation.en: - Great job, everyone! - Eee...
But, not everyone can be a winner...
or a 17- time winner.
The votes are in!
The winner is...
Cory and Chrissy Carson!
We won! We won!
Thank you! Thank you, everyone!
Congratulations, Cory! And where's the star performer?
translation.es: Felicidades, Cory. ¿Y dónde está la estrella?

translation.en: - Star performer? - Chrissy! Chrissy!
Go ahead.
Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy!
Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy!
OK. How about a group picture?
Cory, would you switch places with Chrissy?
translation.es: Cory, ¿cambiarías de lugar con Chrissy? Tapas...

translation.en: You're, uh--  You're blockin' the trophy.
translation.es: Cory, ¿cambiarías de lugar con Chrissy? Tapas... Tapas el trofeo.

translation.en: Oh, uh, OK.
Now, everyone say,  Seventeen!
Seventeen? Seventeen!
A victory like this calls for some ice cream!
- Ice cream! - Yay!
Hey!  It's that Carson kid!
Oh, hey, guys.
Yeah, it's really me.
- Wow! Yeah! - What? - You are so cute! -
Chrissy, can you show us that dance?
Hey, I could show it to you.
Oh, yeah, you're the backup dancer, right?
Uh, no. Actually--
Ooh, Chrissy! You think you can do that dance for us?
I've got some music! Hit it!
Dance!
Come on, Chrissy. Go ahead.
OK!
- Hey, look! There she is! - - It's Chrissy! -
Hey, check me out.  I'm doing The Chrissy!
The Chrissy?
I'm gonna make that kid a star.
Hey, Chrissy! Do you know what a franchise is?
Good evening, Carsons!
Hi, Mr. Coaltrain!
Hey, I saw your dance!
Great job, Chrissy!
Uh, actually, we're a dancing team.
translation.es: De hecho, somos un equipo de baile.

translation.en: Oops!  What did I say? Oh, I meant, Good job, Carsons!
translation.es: ¡Cielos! ¿Qué dije? Quise decir: Buen trabajo, Bólidos.

translation.en: Yeah.  Thanks.
Hey, you know, I have a nephew who really likes to dance.
translation.es: Tengo un sobrino al que le encanta bailar.

translation.en: I think I'll tell him--
Whoa! Don't mean to be rude, but looks like I'm going left. Good job at the show!
translation.es: No quiero ser grosero, pero debo doblar. ¡Buen trabajo hoy!

translation.en: I love you, Chrissy! Bye!
Looks like you have a fan, Chrissy.
Ah, finally home.
- - Papa, phone, phone, phone!
- Ooh! Just in time, too. -
Is everything all right, sweetie?
Oh. Hi, Mama.
Yeah, everything's great.
Great, huh?
Well, it's just--
how come everyone likes Chrissy so much?
translation.es: ¿Por qué a todos les gusta tanto Chrissy?

translation.en: Why don't I have any fans?
Oh, honey, I'm your fan.
That doesn't count.
What? Sure it does.
I just mean everyone's cheering for Chrissy. It's like I wasn't even there.
translation.es: Es decir, todos felicitan a Chrissy. Como si yo no hubiera estado ahí.

translation.en: Oh, Cory. Chrissy didn't take anything away from you.
translation.es: Cory, Chrissy no te quitó nada.

translation.en: She just wanted to have fun with you. And you guys won, together.
translation.es: Solo quería divertirse contigo y ganaron juntos.

translation.en: It was kinda fun.
There's that smile.
And besides, it was just a silly little talent show.
translation.es: Además, era solo un concurso de talentos.

translation.en: Yeah. I guess you're right.  Ow! Ooh! Ah!
Did you eat those corn dogs?
Yes.
But that's not why my engine's racing.
translation.es: Pero no estoy así por eso.

translation.en: Mr. Coaltrain just called and he sent the video to his nephew.
translation.es: El Sr. Ferrocarril le envió el video a su sobrino.

translation.en: So? So!
His nephew is-- is--
- DJ-- - DJ Train Trax!
translation.es: ¿Y? Su sobrino es... DJ... DJ Tren Andén.

translation.en: Oh, Chrissy, you said I could tell them.
What?
What? DJ Train Trax!
W-- what did he say?
He said he loved your dance!
He loved it so much he wants you to be on his show!
translation.es: Tanto que los quiere en su programa.

translation.en: Roll Train is coming to Bumperton Hills! - Wicky- wicky woo- woo! -
translation.es: El tren del ritmo viene a Autovilla. ¡Chucu chucu chu chu!

translation.en: - What a day! - Oh.
Oh, all right, kids.  It's time to get ready for bed.
translation.es: Muy bien, chicos, es hora de irse a dormir.

translation.en: No!  Hey, get back here, you little dance machine.
I'm gonna dance for DJ Train Trax.
translation.es: Voy a bailar para DJ Tren Andén.

translation.en: Time to grab the newspaper and see what that old Carmaduke is up to.
translation.es: Hora de tomar el periódico y leer las aventuras de Autocan.

translation.en: Hey! My dance made the front page!
The Chrissy is the best dance ever.
translation.es: El Chrissy es el mejor baile de la historia.

translation.en: The Chrissy?
Mama!
Chrissy. Have some waffle, not just the syrup.
translation.es: Chrissy, come un waffle, no solo el jarabe.

translation.en: - Chrissy? Chrissy. Chrissy. Chrissy. -
Ah, whatever.
Morning, Cory. Want some syrup? No, thanks, Papa.
translation.es: - Buen día, Cory. ¿Jarabe? - No, gracias, papá.

translation.en: Has anybody seen Mama?
Morning, sleepy head. Hey, Frannie.
Frannie? What are you doing here?
Frannie wanted to treat us to a little business presentation over breakfast.
translation.es: Fany quería darnos una presentación de negocios .

translation.en: It's been very impressive so far.
Thanks, Mrs. C.
Now, if you'll point your attention towards this very professional graph I made,
translation.es: Presten atención a este gráfico muy profesional que hice.

translation.en: the red squiggly line indicates the dance has been
translation.es: La línea roja indica que la popularidad del baile

translation.en: skyrocketing in popularity since last night.
translation.es: La línea roja indica que la popularidad del baile se disparó desde anoche.

translation.en: With approval ratings like this, well--  can you say, college fund?
translation.es: Con estos índices de aprobación... ¿pueden decir fondos universitarios?

translation.en: Ooh, I like the sound of that! Would you like some more to eat, sweetie?
translation.es: Eso suena bien. ¿Quieres comer algo más?

translation.en: No, thanks. I'm stuffed. I couldn't eat another bite of your delicious cooking.
translation.es: No, gracias, ya comí mucha de su deliciosa comida.

translation.en: Besides, we don't really have any time if we're gonna make it to the Roll Train commercial shoot.
translation.es: Además, debemos ir a grabar el comercial de El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: Roll Train commercial shoot? Do you think DJ Train Trax is gonna be there?
translation.es: ¿Un comercial? ¿Creen que DJ Tren Andén esté ahí?

translation.en: I wouldn't doubt it, sweetheart.
It's not Roll Train without the DJ.
translation.es: No es El tren del ritmo sin el DJ.

translation.en: OK, everyone, let's roll out!
Let's go, kids.
- Come on, Chrissy! - Haha! Come on, come on, come on! Let's go!
- This is so exciting! -
I can't wait to meet DJ Train Trax!
translation.es: No veo la hora de conocer a DJ Tren Andén.

translation.en: Oh, no.
The Chrissy?
Um... Maybe they haven't finished adding your name
translation.es: Tal vez aún no agregaron tu nombre

translation.en: to the giant sign in the middle of town.
translation.es: Tal vez aún no agregaron tu nombre al cartel gigante del centro de la ciudad.

translation.en: Yeah.
Uh, I'm sure it's a work in progress.
I don't know. The Chrissy is spelled so big there isn't room for Cory. I mean, look at it!
translation.es: No lo sé. El Chrissy es tan grande que Cory no entra. Mírenlo.

translation.en: I bet you could see it from the highway. Hey, why don't we go inside?
translation.es: - Seguro se ve desde la autopista. - Entremos.

translation.en: Roll Train!
Cory? You coming?
Um, Mama? We did the dance together. Why are they calling it The Chrissy?
translation.es: Mamá, hicimos el baile juntos. ¿Por qué lo llaman El Chrissy?

translation.en: Aww, sweetie. I'm so sorry.
Maybe we can go talk to someone to get this all straightened out.
translation.es: Tal vez podamos aclarar todo esto.

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's a great idea.
translation.es: Sí, creo que es una gran idea.

translation.en: Uh, OK.
Check this out!
Roll Train! This is amazing!
It's really Roll Train. This is so cool!
translation.es: Es El tren del ritmo. ¡Esto es genial!

translation.en: This is all for you, my superstar.
translation.es: Es todo para ti, mi superestrella.

translation.en: OK, guys! Can we go tell somebody about the thing now?
translation.es: Bueno, ¿podemos ir a hablar sobre eso ahora?

translation.en: Tell somebody about what thing?
- - Oh, my gosh! It's Loose Caboose! Oh, wow! You're really famous!
translation.es: ¡Dios mío! Es Furgón Loco. ¡Vaya! Eres muy famoso.

translation.en: And really, really adorable!
I wish I could squeeze your cheek! Uh, but, I won't!
translation.es: Quiero apretarte, pero no lo haré.

translation.en: Unless you want me to.
Uh, I'm cool.
Papa, don't you have something you want to talk to the Caboose about?
translation.es: Papá, ¿no querías hablar con Furgón sobre algo?

translation.en: Oh, right! Can you please sign my bumper sticker?
No. Mama, remember? The thing we were gonna tell them!
translation.es: ¡No! Mamá, ¿recuerdas? Lo que íbamos a decirles.

translation.en: Oh!  Of course. There's been a little mix up.
I'd like you to meet my two children, Cory and Chrissy.
translation.es: Quiero que conozca a mis dos hijos, Cory y Chrissy.

translation.en: Huh? Mama!
Oh!  Whoops! Sorry, I'm a little nervous.
translation.es: Lo siento. Estoy un poco nerviosa.

translation.en: This is the one that came up with the dance.
Of course! Chrissy came up with the dance. That's why it's called The Chrissy.
translation.es: Claro, Chrissy inventó el baile. Por eso se llama El Chrissy.

translation.en: No! That's not right.
So, you didn't come up with the dance? This one did. Congrats!
translation.es: ¿Tú no inventaste el baile? Entonces fue ella. ¡Muy bien!

translation.en: No, no, no!
What we're trying to say is that Cory's the one who--
translation.es: Lo que decimos es que Cory...

translation.en: Here he comes!
Wickita- wickita- wickita- wickita- wickita. - Whoo- whoo! -
Mm! Never gets old.
- - Yep. The platform works.
Great job, everybody. It's gonna be a great show.
translation.es: Buen trabajo, chicos. Será un gran espectáculo.

translation.en: DJ Train Trax!
Yo! What a radical- looking group of groovy cars we have over here!
translation.es: ¡Vaya! ¡Qué grupo tan increíble de autos maravillosos tenemos aquí!

translation.en: My name is DJ Train Trax. Nice to meet you all.
translation.es: Me llamo DJ Tren Andén. Mucho gusto.

translation.en: My name's Cory, Cory Carson! I'm your biggest fan ever!
translation.es: Me llamo Cory Bólidos. Soy su más grande admirador.

translation.en: Right on, little dude.
And we're the Carson family. I'm Mama, this is Papa--
translation.es: Somos la familia Bólidos. Soy Mamá, él es Papá.

translation.en: And I think I already know who this little lady is.
translation.es: Y creo que ya sé quién es esta señorita.

translation.en: - You must be Chrissy Carson. -
Your dance is really groovy stuff!
Uh, Mr. Trax, there's something I wanted to tell you--
And I'm Frannie Fenderson of Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
translation.es: Soy Fany Parabrisas de la agencia de talentos.

translation.en: Chrissy, here, is one of my most promising clients.
translation.es: Chrissy es una de mis clientas más prometedoras.

translation.en: Nice! Glad to see this little superstar's in good hands.
translation.es: ¡Bien! Me alegra que esté en buenas manos.

translation.en: Oh- ho- ho. We got big plans. We're gonna actually take her global.
translation.es: Tenemos grandes planes. Recorrerá el mundo.

translation.en: Actually--  that reminds me, there's a thing I wanted to tell you.
translation.es: Y eso me recuerda que hay algo que quiero decirle.

translation.en: OK, sure.
There you are! Chrissy and Cory, we've got a commercial shoot to do.
translation.es: Ahí están. Chrissy y Cory, a filmar el comercial.

translation.en: We need to get started.
Let's get you guys against that backdrop. Right this way.
translation.es: Los pondremos contra el fondo. Por aquí.

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Trax? What is it, little man?
Hey, Trax? We need to rehearse the opening routine, one more time.
translation.es: Andén, debemos ensayar la apertura una vez más.

translation.en: We'll talk later, little guy. Stay groovy.
Cory! What's the hold up, kiddo? We've got magic to make!
translation.es: ¡Cory! ¿Por qué el atasco? Tenemos que hacer magia.

translation.en: Bah! Come on!
Roll Train! Cory, dance.
- - That's great, Chrissy!
I can see why she's the star.
translation.es: Ya veo por qué es la estrella.

translation.en: Uh, Cory? Try and look like you're having fun.
Smile for the camera, sweetie.
That's somehow worse.
Maybe smile less.
I'm sensing a serious lack of grooviness over here.
translation.es: Siento mucha falta de ritmo aquí.

translation.en: You can't dance without some jams.
translation.es: No se puede bailar sin música.

translation.en: - - Oh, yeah. Crispy!
That's it! You're feelin' it!
Try a reverse 180 groove slide.
Ha- ha! That's it! Get into it.
Looking great, kids!
Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
Yeah, this is great!
And, cut! Great job, everybody. I think we got everything we need, right?
translation.es: Corte. Buen trabajo. Tenemos lo que necesitamos. ¿No?

translation.en: - Yeah! -
That was amazing, Chrissy! The camera loves you. You were born to be a star.
translation.es: Asombroso, Chrissy. La cámara te ama. Naciste para ser una estrella.

translation.en: Good work, guys! I'll see you two at the show.
translation.es: ¡Buen trabajo, chicos! Los veré en el programa.

translation.en: Wait, uh, DJ Train Trax?
Hey, what's up?
The dance. It's my dance. I came up with it.
translation.es: El baile es mío. Yo lo inventé.

translation.en: Yeah, little man. I know.
You know?
Yeah. You and your sister did a great job coming up with it!
translation.es: Sí, tu hermana y tú hicieron un buen trabajo.

translation.en: Thank you. Um, but--
translation.es: Gracias. Pero lo que quiero decir es que no es El Chrissy.

translation.en: what I mean is, it's not really The Chrissy.
translation.es: Pero lo que quiero decir es que no es El Chrissy.

translation.en: Trax, we need you for the meeting!
Hey, little man, I gotta go, but nice work.
translation.es: Oye, me tengo que ir, pero bien hecho.

translation.en: Can't wait to see The Chrissy on the show.
translation.es: Ansío ver El Chrissy en el programa.

translation.en: But--  it's my dance.
Hey, Cory! Time is money, baby! Let's roll out!
Pretty impressive, huh?
Cool! Sure is a lot of stuff.
I like it!
Chrissy!
We've got it all--
bumper stickers, mugs, key chains, air fresheners,
translation.es: Tenemos de todo: calcomanías, tazas, llaveros, aromatizantes, esas cosas para comer maíz.

translation.en: those little handle things for eating corn on the cob.
translation.es: tazas, llaveros, aromatizantes, esas cosas para comer maíz.

translation.en: Ooh, collectibles.
It's me!
Where's mine?
Look behind you.
Huh? Plungers?
I'm a plunger?
We had to diversify the product line, and the resemblance is kind of uncanny.
translation.es: Tuvimos que diversificar la línea, y el parecido es asombroso.

translation.en: This has gone too far.
I have to find a way to win back my dance move.
translation.es: Debo recuperar mi paso de baile.

translation.en: Your dance move?
Yeah, you know--
Oh, you mean The Chrissy.
Gah! That's what I'm talking about!
Too bad you can't come up with a better dance move.
translation.es: Qué pena que no se te ocurra otro.

translation.en: My Aunt Susan's a great dancer, and she invented upwards of four different moves.
translation.es: Mi tía Susan baila muy bien. Inventó más de cuatro pasos diferentes.

translation.en: Wait, say that again.
- My Aunt Susan's-- - N- n- n- no, before that.
translation.es: - Mi tía Susan... - No, lo anterior.

translation.en: Oh, uh, you mean The Chrissy? No, after that.
Ugh, never mind. I know what I have to do.
translation.es: No importa. Sé lo que debo hacer.

translation.en: I'm going to invent a new dance move called The Cory,
translation.es: Inventaré un nuevo baile llamado El Cory.

translation.en: and it will be the greatest dance of all time!
translation.es: ¡Será el mejor baile de la historia!

translation.en: And I'll make a healthy snack.
Cory?
Are you OK?
OK, what about this one? Ready?
Oh, ready.
Don't blink or you'll miss it!
translation.es: No parpadees o no lo verás.

translation.en: I won't blink. OK, here it is.
Ta- da!
Well, uh, I've-- I've never seen anything like it before.
translation.es: Bueno, nunca había visto nada igual.

translation.en: Meh, it's not very good.
Hey, it's a work in progress.
Why don't you try doing this?
Ooh- hoo! Uh- huh! Oh, yeah! You got it! You got it! Mm- hmm!
Yeah, yeah! And move your tires like this.
translation.es: Sí, y mueve tus neumáticos así.

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! Huh! Oh, yeah!  Oh, yeah!
Yeah, that's good! Try wigglin' a little bit more.
translation.es: Sí, muy bien. Intenta moverte un poco más.

translation.en: Now spin around!
Faster! Faster! Whoo!
Hey, this feels good. What do you think, Freddie?
Mmm... well...
I'm doing The Chrissy, aren't I?
Mmm... yeah.
It looked good, though.
Come on, Freddie. Time to kick it up a notch.
translation.es: Vamos, Freddy. Hora de subir el nivel.

translation.en: Yes!
Hero of orange, stripes of white
translation.es: Héroe de cuatro ruedas y  blancas rayas

translation.en: Move like the wind and ready to fight
translation.es: Me muevo como el viento Listo para dar batalla

translation.en: There's a rhythm in me That I have to find
translation.es: Y encontrar en mí el ritmo que buscaba

translation.en: A beat in time
I'm just a dancing guy
translation.es: Solo soy un chico que baila

translation.en: Groovin' all the time
Gotta find that rhythm
I'll walk through fire To the edge of time
Won't stop till the whole wide world Can see me shine
translation.es: No me detendré hasta que todo el mundo Me vea brillar

translation.en: Every dancer has to become the dance
translation.es: Todo bailarín Debe convertirse en el baile

translation.en: And I-- I think I finally found it This time
translation.es: Y creo que finalmente lo encontré

translation.en: No, no, not this time
There's a rhythm I still have to find
A beat in time
I can feel it shine, shine, shine
translation.es: Un brillo que no para, no para

translation.en: Shine
I'll race through forests And cross the open seas
translation.es: Atravesaré bosques Y el mar abierto

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! Till I find The magic rhythm that's in me Whoa! Whoa!
translation.es: Hasta encontrar el ritmo mágico Que llevo dentro

translation.en: - That's it! -
Come over here, everybody! Cory's got a new dance!
translation.es: Vengan. Cory tiene un nuevo baile.

translation.en: - - Whoa. Oh, yeah! Uh- huh! Oh, yeah!
That was amazing!
I loved what you were doing with your tires! That's my friend!
translation.es: - Me encantó el paso. - ¡Ese es mi amigo!

translation.en: Go Cory! Go Cory! Go Cory!
Dance with Cory!
I've never seen anything like that. What is that called?
translation.es: Jamás vi algo así. ¿Cómo se llama?

translation.en: The Cory.
Introducing our first guest--
He's from a small town but has some big talent!
translation.es: es de un pueblo pequeño, pero tiene un gran talento.

translation.en: Mmm, give it up for--
- - Cory Carson, performing his new dance,
translation.es: ...para Cory Bólidos  y su nuevo baile,

translation.en: The Cory!
Whoa! Oh, yeah! It's The Cory! It's The Cory!
That was star- tastic! Can we see that again?
- - Oh, no- no- no- no- no. I couldn't possibly. It'd be too much.
But, if you insist!
Dance with Cory!
Chrissy! What are you doing? I need to practice.
Chrissy- Cory dance.
Oh, yeah! Mm- hmm!
What? Chrissy, stop!
Chrissy!
What? No!
Chrissy, that's my dance.
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¡No! ¡Chrissy! ¡Ese es mi baile! No puedes robártelo.

translation.en: You're not allowed to take it.
translation.es: ¡Ese es mi baile! No puedes robártelo.

translation.en: You already took The Chrissy. You aren't taking this one, too.
translation.es: Ya me robaste El Chrissy, no me robarás este también.

translation.en: Cory dance with Chrissy?
No, Chrissy. I wanna dance alone.
No more dance?
Can't sleep?
Oh! Uh, nope.
I was just getting a snack.
Thanks, Mama.
So, you excited about the show tomorrow?
Yeah, uh, totally.
Cory, I'm sorry this week hasn't gone the way you hoped it would,
translation.es: Lamento que esta semana no fuera como esperabas,

translation.en: but I just want you to know, I'm really proud of you.
translation.es: pero quiero que sepas que estoy muy orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: Really?
Your papa and I are so excited to see you dance on Roll Train tomorrow.
translation.es: Papá y yo estamos muy entusiasmados de verlos bailar mañana.

translation.en: And what are we supposed to remember before any performance?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay que recordar antes de una actuación?

translation.en: just have fun?
So... tomorrow...
- just have fun, OK? -
OK, I will, I will.
Now, try to get some sleep.
OK, Mama.
That girl loves dancing with her big brother. Thanks for being such a good one, Cory.
translation.es: Ella adora bailar contigo. Gracias por ser tan buen hermano.

translation.en: Goodnight.
Ah, perfect.
Oh, I can't wait to see this!  I have all of their bumper stickers.
Ooh! I love Roll Train.
translation.es: Me encanta El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: She's the best dancer!  Ever!
Best seat in the house.
Oh, sorry, bit of a wide load here. Comin' through.
Thanks, Dad!
Hey, down in front!
Carsons, you're here!
Hi, Caboose!
Follow me.
Looks pretty good all lit up, huh?
How we doin', Phil? No fires yet.
Cory, we're gonna have you on the lower platform.
translation.es: Cory, estarás en la plataforma inferior.

translation.en: Go ahead, Cory. OK.
Chrissy...
we'll have you up here on the star platform,
translation.es: tú estarás en la plataforma estelar.

translation.en: right next to you know who.
And on DJ Train Trax's cue, you'll be lifted up into  super stardom!
translation.es: Y, cuando DJ Tren Andén te nombre, subirás al superestrellato.

translation.en: Psst. We're live in two minutes, Caboose.
Positions. Positions, everyone.
- - Two minutes till showtime, folks. Let's go! Positions!
translation.es: Dos minutos para el show. A sus puestos.

translation.en: Ready?
Ready!
No!
What's wrong, Chrissy? No more dance.
That's a good one, Chrissy.
Come on. It's dance time!
No more dance!
Yo!
What's the commotion over here?
It's Chrissy.
I'm not sure she wants to do the dance, DJ.
translation.es: Creo que no quiere bailar, DJ.

translation.en: Ah, I see.
I don't understand what could've happened.
We couldn't get her to stop dancing just yesterday.
Hey, little lady. It's OK. Everyone gets nervous.
translation.es: Está bien, pequeña, a todos nos da nervios.

translation.en: We'd hate to do the show without you. Are you sure you don't wanna do the dance with us?
translation.es: - Odiaríamos hacer el show sin ti. - ¿Seguro no quieres bailar?

translation.en: No more dance!
All right, that's fine by me. That's cool.
But, uh, we really can't do The Chrissy without Chrissy. It will be just the The.
translation.es: No podemos hacer El Chrissy sin Chrissy. Sería el El.

translation.en: That's why we're changing it.
We're doin' The Cory,
represented by Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
I thought you worked for Chrissy.
I don't follow the puck, Mr. Trax. I head wherever the puck is going to be.
translation.es: No sigo la pelota, señor Andén, voy adónde irá la pelota.

translation.en: Wait, what's the plan, exactly?
Rebranding.
Did you know my boy, Cory, here has his own dance called The Cory?
translation.es: ¿Sabían que Cory tiene su propio baile, El Cory?

translation.en: I've seen it. It's even better than The Chrissy.
translation.es: Lo vi y es mejor que El Chrissy.

translation.en: That true, Cory?
Did you really come up with your own dance?
Well, yeah, I did.
Bingo!
Cory, my man, are you OK to do the dance alone?
Uh, yeah, I can dance alone.
Chrissy? Where you goin', honey?
- Slow down! - I'm sorry about all this.
Please, it's fine. We've got this.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Lo tenemos bajo control.

translation.en: Cory, you OK?
Uh, yeah, Mama. We'll be watching!
OK, everyone, we are doing The Cory. I repeat, we are doing The Cory.
translation.es: Oigan todos, haremos El Cory. Repito, haremos El Cory.

translation.en: Change it to The Cory. Okie dokie.
Rolling and... action.
- - All aboard! It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.es: ¡Todos a bordo! Es hora de subir a El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: We've got a great show lined up for you tonight.
translation.es: Tenemos un gran show esta noche.

translation.en: If you're in Bumperton Hills, this is the place to be.
translation.es: Si están en Autovilla, no pueden perdérselo.

translation.en: Give it up for the Roll Train Locomotions!
Don't get emotional, kid. You're about to get everything you ever wanted,
translation.es: No te pongas sensible, tendrás lo que siempre quisiste,

translation.en: and I will get ten percent of everything you ever wanted.
translation.es: y yo tendré el 10 % de eso.

translation.en: - What? - Oh! Uh, nothing.
Pop a tire out there, Cory!
You ready, little man?
Yeah, I think so.
Great. I'll do the intro and then my brother will send you up.
translation.es: ¡Genial! Yo te presentaré y mi hermano te subirá.

translation.en: Your brother?
Yeah, you know, that guy.
Phil? Phil is your brother?
No! No. That guy.
Let's get camera four ready for DJ's intro.
translation.es: Prepara la cámara cuatro para DJ.

translation.en: The Loose Caboose is your brother?
Sure is. He's a good one, too.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Y es muy buen hermano. No estaría aquí, si no fuera por él.

translation.en: I wouldn't be up here if it wasn't for him.
translation.es: Y es muy buen hermano. No estaría aquí, si no fuera por él.

translation.en: The dance moves, the catch phrases,
translation.es: Los pasos de baile, las frases,

translation.en: the wicky- wicky- whoo- whoo!
He came up with all that.
Really?  Yeah.
He even came up with the name Roll Train.
I wanted to call the show Funky Dance Time.
translation.es: Yo propuse La hora del baile funky.

translation.en: That's horrible!  I know! I know.
I owe a lot to him. The best part of this show is that we get to do it together.
translation.es: Le debo mucho. Lo mejor de este programa es que podemos hacerlo juntos.

translation.en: Huh. Yeah.
And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion, everybody's favorite friend of funk--
translation.es: Ahora, la locomotora de la locomoción, el favorito...

translation.en: - D- d- d- d- d- DJ... - That's my cue.
- ...Train Trax! - Just remember,
translation.es: - Me toca. - ¡DJ Tren Andén! Recuerda: no puedes bailar mal si te estás divirtiendo.

translation.en: there's no wrong way to dance as long as you're having fun.
translation.es: Recuerda: no puedes bailar mal si te estás divirtiendo.

translation.en: See you up there, Cory.
Wicky- wicky whoo- whoo!
Give it up one more time
- for the Roll Train Locomotions! - Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
- Whoo- hoo! Woo! - Now, it's time to introduce... - - ...a very special guest from Bumperton...
translation.es: Ahora presentaremos a un invitado especial de Autovilla.

translation.en: And back to DJ Train Trax.
- Well, let's get right to it then. - Chrissy.
Yeah.
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Cory Carson
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, les presento a Cory Bólidos,

translation.en: performing his new signature dance move-- The Cory!
translation.es: que mostrará su nuevo paso de baile, El Cory.

translation.en: Cut to commercial. Cut to commercial.
We'll be right back.
Love my natural spring water.
translation.es: Me encanta mi agua mineral natural.

translation.en: - Chrissy? Chrissy? - Chrissy!
Chrissy? Sweetie?  Come on out, Chrissy.
Chrissy!
Cory? What are you doing here?
Where's Chrissy?
Oh, she's still a bit camera shy. We can't get her to come out.
translation.es: Le dio timidez. No podemos hacer que salga.

translation.en: Do you think I could try talking to her?
OK, people, this is not a drill. We are at Defcon derailed.
translation.es: Esto no es un simulacro. Estamos muy descarrilados.

translation.en: Caboose! W- what do we do? We can't find the kids anywhere!
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos? No encontramos a los niños.

translation.en: I don't know. This is a huge mess!
translation.es: No lo sé. Esto es un desastre.

translation.en: Did someone say, mess?
I've been cleanin' up messes for 28 years.
Who are you?
Chrissy?
Chrissy?
I'm sorry, Chrissy.
I got so caught up with being a good dancer,
translation.es: Me importó tanto ser buen bailarín

translation.en: I stopped being a good brother.
translation.es: que dejé de ser buen hermano.

translation.en: This whole thing was supposed to be fun,
but it's no fun without you.
translation.es: Pero no es divertido sin ti.

translation.en: Remember this one?
I call this one The Chris- ory!
translation.es: A este lo llamo El Chris-ory.

translation.en: I call this move The Chrissy Cory Crissy- cross!
translation.es: Y a este lo llamo El Cruce Chrissy Cory.

translation.en: Cory?
Cory Train Trax!
I'm sorry, Chrissy.
Let's go home.
No!
Dance with Cory!
Really?
Yeah!
Aww. OK, then.  Let's get down!
Comin' through! Trax, Trax!
translation.es: Abran paso. Andén, él dice que solía cantar.

translation.en: This guy said he used to be a singer.
translation.es: Andén, él dice que solía cantar.

translation.en: I think it's our only option at this point.
Right on.
Finally.
We're changing The Cory
translation.es: EL CORY Cambia El Cory por El Conserje.

translation.en: to The Janitor.
translation.es: Cambia El Cory por El Conserje.

translation.en: OK, this is where you'll be.
Better take your position, Trax. You, follow me. You really saved our caboose.
translation.es: Ve a tu puesto, Andén. Tú ven conmigo. Nos salvaste el furgón.

translation.en: Here it is.
translation.es: Ve a tu puesto, Andén. Tú ven conmigo. Nos salvaste el furgón. Aquí está.

translation.en: We're here!
Huh? Where have you been?
I didn't wanna go on without my sister, but I talked to her and we're ready to go on together.
translation.es: No quería hacerlo sin mi hermana, pero hablamos y lo haremos juntos.

translation.en: That's great, little man!
So, what dance are we doing?
The Chrissy!
Change it back to The Chrissy.
translation.es: EL CONSERJE - Pon El Chrissy. - No, renuncio.

translation.en: Change it yourself. I quit.
- Hey! - Huh?
Where are you going? There's room up here for you, too!
translation.es: ¿Adónde vas? También hay lugar para ti.

translation.en: Yeah!
Really?
We're on in ten.
Ten seconds. Ten seconds, everyone.
Hey, Cory. Nice job.
With the dance?
Nah, for being a groovy older brother.
translation.es: No. Por ser un hermano mayor genial.

translation.en: Thanks, DJ Train Trax.
- Ready? - Ready!
- - Wicka- wicka whoo- whoo!
Welcome back to Roll Train!
translation.es: Bienvenidos a El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: Next up, we've got quite the treat for you--
a voice of satin, a heart of gold, a groovy mustache that doesn't get old.
translation.es: Una voz de satén, un corazón de oro, un bigote maravilloso que adoro.

translation.en: Give it up for...
uh, this guy!
The stars shine brighter together
What if you and I were together?
translation.es: ¿Y si tú y yo estuviéramos juntos?

translation.en: It's like listening to an angel.
translation.es: Es como escuchar a un ángel.

translation.en: 'Cause I believe in you
And if you believe in me, too
translation.es: Y si tú también crees en mí

translation.en: There's nothing that we cannot achieve  Aah!
When we're together
And now, Cory and Chrissy Carson performing The Chrissy!
translation.es: Y ahora Cory y Chrissy Bólidos interpretan El Chrissy.

translation.en: - - Whoo- hoo! Oh, yeah! Uh- huh!
All right, Bumperton Hills!
Let's get down!
Come on!
Ooh, let's get this party started!
Kimmy on the Roll Train. Timmy on the Roll Train.
translation.es: Kimmy y Timmy en El tren del ritmo.

translation.en: - Everybody get on this stage! - Oh, yeah! - Wicky- wicky whoo- whoo! -
translation.es: - ¡Suban todos al escenario! - ¡Sí! ¡Chucu chucu chu chu!

translation.en: Care to dance, Mama? - Oh, my! -
It's all about the wipers, baby!
Come on, Freddie, let's get this train rollin'!
translation.es: Vamos, Freddy. A mover este tren.

translation.en: Mom, you've gotta move your tires like this.
Go ahead, Caboose! Cut it loose!
Ah, yeah, that's my brother.
- The Chrissy, The Chrissy... - Wicky- wicky whoo- whoo!
- Oh, yeah! Uh- huh! Ooh- ooh- ooh! - Oh, yeah! Mm- hmm! Oh, yeah!
Here's my card.
Give me a call if you want to talk about your future.
translation.es: Llámeme si quiere hablar de su futuro.

translation.en: Yeah, let's get it, y'all!
Wicka- wicka whoo- whoo!
